name: Eleanor Vance
clue: Julian was rewriting his will tonight. He signed the papers on the napkin at dinner. I saw him put it in his pocket. He was cutting Marcus out.

name: Marcus Sterling
clue: Julian didn't have the liquidity he claimed. He was leveraging the company assets to pay off a blackmailer. I saw the bank notices in his desk.

name: Sofia Rodriguez
clue: Julian refused the champagne. He had his own private drink he insisted on pouring himself, and he kept it close like he didn't trust anyone. He kept it under the bar.

name: Billy Taggart
clue: I heard an ATV idling out toward Dawson Forest around 1:15 AM. It wasn't one of ours. Someone was waiting out there.

name: Dr. Aris Thorne
clue: I smelled his breath when he yelled at me. It wasn't just alcohol. It smelled like burnt almonds. That's Cyanide, not moonshine.

name: Patricia O'Neil
clue: I counted the inventory. We are missing one crystal flute from the VIP set, and the antique racing helmet from the display is facing the wrong way.

name: Caleb Hunt
clue: I saw tracks in the red clay leading off the deck. Someone dragged something heavy toward the river bank. The rain is washing them away fast.

name: Chloe Kim
clue: I overheard Julian in the bathroom. He was on the phone yelling: 'I know it was you! If the siren goes off tomorrow, it won't be for a victory!'
